stories.text:
Hi hackers. It is legal to open source our work we had made in our client ?. our client are gov organization.

Our intent to eliminate yearly expensive software budget in other orgs (same business model) that need exact solutions which we have solved.

there is no single terms about source code license in our contract.
stories.title: Open sourcing client project (gov sector)

stories.text: I haven't had a chance to use either of these tools yet, but I'm interested to learn from those who have. All I see are articles and tweets saying how amazing they both are, but I haven't really heard updates from software development professionals about how well (or not) this is working for them on a daily basis. What has your experience been like? How has it impacted your workflow? Is this a fad or will it have staying power in your opinion?
stories.title: Ask HN: Professional devs, what has been your experience using Codex/Co-pilot?
